title: Blue cheese dressing
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons minced onion', '1 tablespoon minced garlic', '1 small bunch fresh parsley, chopped', '110ml (4 fl oz) soured cream', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '80g (3 oz) blue cheese, crumbled', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
